oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic food and farming research in Finland
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nykänen, Arja
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Research methodology and philosophy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In Finland we have a tendency of increasing activities in organic food and farming research during last five years. Most of the organic food and farming research i Finland is carried out at the MTT Agrifood Research Finland. The rest is done at the universities and other institutes.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Nykänen, Arja (2006) Organic food and farming research in Finland. Forskningsnytt om økologisk landbruk i Norden (2), pp. 20-21.
